attributes.action: Reinstall Lincoln city's steps near the "Empowerment" sculpture
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reinstall Lincoln city's steps that once existed near the "Empowerment" sculpture on waterside. The steps were a major meeting place for the residents of Lincolnshire. The steps were removed because of the amount of "skaters" that used the area.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
